name: r3
tagline: Espacio para compartir info con los participantes del lab Reciclar Reducir Reutilizar
body:
# Reciclar Reducir Reutilizar

## Gis y Cartograf√≠a

### Fotos y Geotagging

[Camera MX (Android)](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.magix.camera_mx&hl=en)

Editores de Exif

[Robogeo](http://www.robogeo.com/)

[HoudahGeo (Mac)](http://houdah.com/houdahGeo/download.html)Exporta grupos de fotos a kml y csv ( gmaps ), [Tutorial](http://multimedia.journalism.berkeley.edu/tutorials/geotagging-photos/createcsv/)

[Geosetter](http://www.geosetter.de/)


### Servicios de Mapas

[Google Maps Engine](https://mapsengine.google.com/)

* [Gmaps y excel](http://techpageone.dell.com/technology/create-maps-combining-excel-google/#.VEJSA4vF8eR)
* 

[CroudMap](https://crowdmap.com)

[MapBox](https://www.mapbox.com)

### Tutoriales

[Geotag videos Youtube](http://www.labnol.org/internet/geo-tag-youtube-videos/21201/)
